cats.name: Pretty Kitty
cats.description: The Bombay cat is a medium-sized, stocky, and muscular breed known for its jet-black, glossy coat that resembles patent leather and its striking copper or gold-colored eyes.

cats.name: Roco
cats.description: Persian cats are a medium-sized, heavily-boned breed known for their extremely long, thick, and glossy fur, short legs and neck, round head with a distinctive flat face and large round eyes, and small ears.

cats.name: Lisa
cats.description: Siamese cats are characterized by their striking colorpoint coats, which feature a pale body with darker points on their face, ears, paws, and tail, a trait caused by temperature-sensitive albinism.

cats.name: Garry
cats.description: The Bombay cat is a medium-sized, stocky, and muscular breed known for its jet-black, glossy coat that resembles patent leather and its striking copper or gold-colored eyes.

cats.name: Pesho
cats.description: The American Bobtail bears a distinct resemblance to a bobtailed wildcat. From her markings and alert, hunter’s gaze to her short, expressive tail, her appearance suggests a scaled-down version of that wild cat.

cats.name: Speedo
cats.description: As a working cat, American Shorthairs have a stocky, muscular build. Their muscular legs lend themselves to the American’s agility and endurance. They have a large head and full face, medium-sized ears and large, wide eyes.
